author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: أَشْكُرُكَ يا إِلهَ الأَسْماءِ وَأَحْمَدُكَ يا فاطِرَ السَّمآءِ بِما رَأَيْتُ فِي هذِهِ الأَيَّامِ مِنْ طُغاةِ عِبادِكَ وَبُغاةِ بَرِيَّتِكَ، أَسْئَلُكَ بِأَنْ تَجْعَلَنا
translation: Thanks be to Thee, O Thou the Lord of all names; and glory be to Thee, O Maker of the heavens, for all that I have sustained in these days at the hands of such of Thy servants as have transgressed against Thee, and of Thy people that have dealt frowardly towards Thee.
